prep.shiny 0.1.0

Module Server wrapper

moduleServer.Rd

Starting in Shiny 1.5 the recomdation will be to use a method for definding the server that calls a functionand will include a new function moduleServer that is below instead of use callModule that was in Shiny 1.4 Reference: https://github.com/rstudio/shiny/blob/master/R/modules.R For an example see https://mastering-shiny.org/action-modules.html

Usage

moduleServer(id, module, session = getDefaultReactiveDomain())

Arguments

id
module
session

Value

The return value of the module function, if any.
